tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE user_tokens (token_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), token VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE password_resets (reset_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), reset_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    role_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tokens (
    token_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    token_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    token_value VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    expiry_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
